title: I’m a freelance web developer
description:
I'm a full-stack developer with 5 years of experience who specializes in building custom web applications and e-Commerce shops. In addition to my development skills, I'm also passionate about creating great user experiences through design and usability. What sets me apart is my strong focus on project management, where I work closely with clients to break down complex projects into manageable tasks and prioritize work using Agile methodologies like Scrum and Kanban.

Let's work together to build software that not only looks great but also delivers a seamless and intuitive user experience.
fourthSkill: E-Commerce Development with Shopware 5/6, JTL and custom Shops
horschJob: Creating concepts, designs and developing multiple Webapps and a Shopware 6 Plugin
ttJob: Developing a headless online shop in a team using modern frontend frameworks like next.js while incorporating data from backend services.
armbrJob: Developing Web Apps, JTL Shop Plugins, Shopware 5/6 plugins, scripts and maintaining online shops.
seglerJob: Developing an award winning iOS Enterprise App for protocolling internal processes.
miconyJob: Developing a Shopware 6 template for a digital e-commerce platform and an iOS app concept.
horvathJob: To promote a new digital product, I created a marketing website from start to finish, including concept development, design, and implementation.
